leukapp.apps.individuals package¶

Application used to track and edit Individuals.

The main model of this application is the Indiviual. This model represents the top class in the Leukgen ecosystem, it usually refers to patients, mice and other kind of organisms.

It’s child model is the Specimen which is managed by the specimens application.
